text: Johannpeter is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: * André Bier Gerdau Johannpeter (born 1963), Brazilian businessman and equestrian * Jorge Gerdau Johannpeter (born 1936), Brazilian businessman and equestrian == See also == * Asteroid 19970 Johannpeter, named after Johann Peter Hebel (1760–1826)
title: Johannpeter
